fields.description: Indicates this person is deceased. When selected, also enables Do Not Contact, Do Not Call, Email Opt Out, and Fax Opt Out. If the Contact is not the only member of the Household, the Contact name is removed from the Household name.

fields.description: If you've set "Work" as the Primary Address type, the Work Address is populated with the Mailing Address values. If "Work" is the Secondary Address type, the Work Address is populated with the "Other Address" values. This field is read-only.
fields.formula:
if(
    ISPICKVAL(hed__Primary_Address_Type__c,"Work"),
    if(ISBLANK(MailingStreet) , "" , MailingStreet & ", ") &
    if(ISBLANK(MailingCity) , "" , MailingCity & ", ") &
    if(ISBLANK(MailingState) , "" , MailingState & " ") &
    if(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode) , "" , MailingPostalCode) &
    If(ISBLANK(MailingCountry ) , "" , ", " & MailingCountry)
    ,
    if(ISPICKVAL(hed__Secondary_Address_Type__c,"Work"),
    if(ISBLANK(OtherStreet) , "" , OtherStreet & ", ") &
    if(ISBLANK(OtherCity) , "" , OtherCity & ", ") &
    if(ISBLANK(OtherState) , "" , OtherState & " ") &
    if(ISBLANK(OtherPostalCode) , "" , OtherPostalCode) &
    If(ISBLANK(OtherCountry ) , "" , ", " & OtherCountry)
    ,
    "")
)
fields.inlineHelpText: Formula: If the Primary Address Type is Work, the Mailing Address.  If the Secondary Address Type is Work, the Other Address.
fields.label: Work Address

fields.description: When selected, this Contact's address won't be synced with the Household Default or Seasonal Address. Use this to maintain a separate Mailing Address for this particular Contact. (Applies to Household Contacts only.)
fields.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Contact's Current address overrides any new or seasonal address. (Applies to Household Contacts only.)
fields.label: Do Not Automatically Update
